BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Internal.BitVector.size#
BlackBox.type: size# :: KnownNat n => BitVector n -> Int

BlackBox.type: maxIndex# :: KnownNat n => BitVector n -> Int

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Internal.BitVector.high
BlackBox.type: high :: Bit

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Internal.BitVector.low
BlackBox.type: low :: Bit

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Internal.BitVector.++#
BlackBox.type: (++#) :: KnownNat m => BitVector n -> BitVector m -> BitVector (n + m)

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Internal.BitVector.reduceAnd#
BlackBox.type: reduceAnd# :: KnownNat n => BitVector n -> BitVector 1

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Internal.BitVector.reduceOr#
BlackBox.type: reduceOr# :: BitVector n -> BitVector 1

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Internal.BitVector.reduceXor#

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Internal.BitVector.index#
BlackBox.type:
index# :: KnownNat n  -- ARG[0]
        => BitVector n -- ARG[1]
        -> Int         -- ARG[2]
        -> Bit

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Internal.BitVector.replaceBit#
BlackBox.type:
replaceBit# :: KnownNat n  -- ARG[0]
             => BitVector n -- ARG[1]
             -> Int         -- ARG[2]
             -> Bit         -- ARG[3]
             -> BitVector n

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Internal.BitVector.setSlice#
BlackBox.type:
setSlice# :: BitVector (m + 1 + i) -- ARG[0]
           -> SNat m                -- ARG[1]
           -> SNat n                -- ARG[2]
           -> BitVector (m + 1 - n) -- ARG[3]
           -> BitVector (m + 1 + i)

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Internal.BitVector.slice#
BlackBox.type:
slice# :: BitVector (m + 1 + i) -- ARG[0]
        -> SNat m                -- ARG[1]
        -> SNat n                -- ARG[2]
        -> BitVector (m + 1 - n)

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Internal.BitVector.split#
BlackBox.type:
split# :: KnownNat n        -- ARG[0]
        => BitVector (m + n) -- ARG[1]
        -> (BitVector m, BitVector n)

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Internal.BitVector.msb#
BlackBox.type:
msb# :: KnownNat n  -- ARG[0]
      => BitVector n -- ARG[1]
      -> Bit

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.Internal.BitVector.lsb#
BlackBox.type:
lsb# :: BitVector n -- ARG[0]
      -> Bit

BlackBox.type: times# :: KnownNat (m + n) => BitVector m -> BitVector n -> BitVector (m + n)
